headline: New Downy速 Gentle Soft + Fresh Debuts with Audio Romance Series, "Almost Scandalously Soft Stories"
summary: CINCINNATI, August 11, 2025--Downy速, a trusted leader in laundry, announces the launch of Downy Gentle Soft + Fresh, a new fabric softener designed for consumers who want softness and scent without compromising on gentleness. Supporting the launch is an original audio campaign, "Almost Scandalously Soft Stories," a series of immersive audio romance stories now streaming on Spotify.
